sections.name: #Loop
sections.documentation: This section is executed aprox. every 83ms.

sections.name: #Loop5
sections.documentation: This section is executed every 5 Seconds.

sections.name: #Loop15
sections.documentation: This section is executed every 15 Seconds.

sections.name: #Loop60
sections.documentation: This section is executed every 60 Seconds.

sections.name: #Loop300
sections.documentation: This section is executed every 300 Seconds.

sections.name: #OnInit
sections.documentation: This section is executed once on start of software.

sections.name: #OnShutdown
sections.documentation: This section is executed on shutdown of software.

sections.name: #OnStart
sections.documentation: This section is executed on Program start.

sections.name: #OnEnd
sections.documentation: This section is executed on Program end.

sections.name: #OnPause
sections.documentation: This section is executed on Machine Pause.

sections.name: #OnStop
sections.documentation: This section is executed on Machine Stop / Program End.

sections.name: #OnEStop
sections.documentation: This section is executed on Machine E-Stop.

sections.name: #OnJog
sections.documentation: This section is executed if Jogging is used.

sections.name: #OnWheel
sections.documentation: This section is executed if Handwheel is used.

sections.name: #OnCmd
sections.documentation: This section is executed if a command is triggered.

functions.name: notexists
functions.documentation: Checks if value does not exists

functions.name: isnum
functions.documentation: Checks if value is valid number

functions.name: exp
functions.documentation: e raised to the given power

functions.name: roundup
functions.documentation: Round up or down to nearest integer

functions.name: ge
functions.documentation: Relational greater than or equal to

functions.name: le
functions.documentation: Relational less than or equal to

functions.name: debug
functions.documentation: Prints to output window if debug==true

functions.name: setunit
functions.documentation: Chooses value based on settings units

gcodes.name: G03 - Counter Clockwise Arc Feed Move
G33.1 - Spindle Synch Motion With Return
G73 - Drill: Drill, Speed Peck, Dwell
G85 - Bore: Feed In, Feed Out
G86 - Bore: Feed In, Spindle Stop, Rapid Out, Spindle Start
gcodes.detail: Bore: Feed In, Spindle Stop, Rapid Out, Spindle Start

gcodes.name: G87 - Bore: Feed In, Spindle Reverse, Rapid Out, Spindle Reverse
gcodes.detail: Bore: Feed In, Spindle Reverse, Rapid Out, Spindle Reverse

gcodes.name: G88 - Bore: Feed In, Spindle Stop, Feed Out, Spindle Start
gcodes.detail: Bore: Feed In, Spindle Stop, Feed Out, Spindle Start

gcodes.name: G89 - Bore: Feed In, Spindle Reverse, Feed Out, Spindle Reverse
gcodes.detail: Bore: Feed In, Spindle Reverse, Feed Out, Spindle Reverse

gcodes.name: G94 - Feed Mode - Units per Minute
G95 - Feed Mode - Units per Revolution
G98 - Cycle Return - Initial Z Point

comments.name: POINT
comments.detail: adds point from data to collection

comments.name: POINT
comments.detail: adds point from probe to collection

comments.name: POINTPOS
comments.detail: adds point from position to collection

comments.name: PYTHR
comments.detail: executes python script in async thread

comments.name: CRC16
comments.detail: calculates and adds crc16 to parameters

comments.name: CRC32
comments.detail: calculates and adds CRC32 to parameters

comments.name: COLOR=0xRRGGBB
comments.documentation:
Draws all lines in 3D View in the selected color which follows this entry.

g-code color in hex-notation

0xffffff = white, 0x000000 = black, 0xff0000 = red, 0x00ff00 = green, 0x0000ff = blue

owords.name: call
owords.label: call [value]
owords.documentation:
O<id> sub
	(print,Values: #1, #2)
O<id> endsub [13]

O<id> call [11] [12]
(print,Returned value: #<_return>)

owords.name: continue
owords.detail: Skip the remaining block and start next loop
owords.documentation:
O<test> continue
Skip the remaining block and start next loop

owords.name: break
owords.documentation:
O<test> break
Exit the loop block

owords.name: if
owords.label: if..else..endif
owords.snippet:
O<${1:myBlock}> if [${2:condition}]
	$3
O<$1> else
	$0
O<$1> endif
